description_zh: 收录独立开发作品的周刊，包括网站、客户端应用、开源项目等，发布于微信公众号'独立开发'。
description_en: A weekly newsletter featuring independently developed works, including websites, client applications, open-source projects, etc., published on the WeChat official account 'Independent Development'.
rating_zh: 你的作品可以是网站，客户端产品，也可以是Github上的开源项目或自媒体，形式不限。通过作品博主会更新到公众号上
rating_en: Your works can be websites, client products, open-source projects on GitHub, or self-media, with no restrictions on the form. The blogger will update the works on the official account of the WeChat public platform.
